post.body: Fellow Nigerians!Learning never ends.Let's learn frm Ghana
I tnk we shld all give Ghana props for conducting an election free of rigging,ballot box snatching and violence.
I used to hear that people get addicted to their job.I tnk i knw wt it means nw.u wnt to leave,bt u jst can't.wonder y?
U know, i used to think that Carlifornia was always hot and dry.
oh !av been bak frm lunch since.Am not sure if it's my taste bud or the hunger-i gotta say dt d meal wz very delicious.
Now,i must eat.I don't want to commit suicide.OFF I GOOOOOOOOO!!!
I am looking for accomodation in lagos.Let me know if u have one that's not2xpnsiv.EXPENSIVE is relative,abi?so i tot.Well!not outrageous.
I am working.I am kinda hungry too,i guess that will have to wait.
I just finished working on an education story.I want to report on a couple of events like ICAN induction on the 25th of November,2008.
I am a reporter.I am still at work.
I liken d Middle east situation to dt of the Niger-Delta in Nigeria.It's always dia,always bn dia,yet we pay little attention2it.WAT A SHAME
Aside bein a NEXT reporter,i am deeply concerned abt situations in d region.i tnk itst's high time we did something.
quassam!i am really open2news reports frm d middle east.tnks man
i got 2 d office abt an hour ago wt a serious headache.ow u guys doin?
